column1: Generating Chinese Ci with Designated Metrical Structure

column4: Zhiyuan Hu@Beijing University of Chemical Technology

column1: AAAI Technical Track: Natural Language Processing
Ci is a lyric poetry form that follows highly restrictive metrical structures. This makes it challenging for a computer to compose Ci subject to a specified metrical requirement. In this work
column2: we adapt the CVAE framework to automated Ci generation under metrical constraints. Specifically
column3: we present the first neural model that explicitly encodes the designated metrical structure for Ci generation. The proposed model is shown experimentally to generate Ci with nearly perfect metrical structures.
